text: Gibraltar national football team is the national football team of Gibraltar. The team joined UEFA in May of 2013 and played their first match against Slovakia on 19 November 2013. They were also accepted into FIFA on 13 May 2016. So far, they have not qualified for any major tournament. == Record == === FIFA World Cup === World Cup Record World Cup Record World Cup Record World Cup Record World Cup Record World Cup Record World Cup Record World Cup Record World Cup Record Qualification record Qualification record Qualification record Qualification record Qualification record Qualification record Qualification record Qualification record Qualification record Year Round 1930 to 2014 Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member Not a FIFA member 2018 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 10 0 0 10 3 47 2022 To be determined To be determined To be determined To be determined To be determined To be determined To be determined To be determined -
